prev
next
224m²  773.493m²REF PV-T-546

Property located in the heart of Costa Vicentina, with 2 Houses, close to the sea and beaches. With lots of vegetation, with excellent land to promote agricultural activities . Water supplied through the public network, the Irrigation Channel , existing Wells in the property and from a dam. Electricity and telephone supply - public network. Excellent sun exposure.

entry.title: Farm Canada Aljezur - water, electricity, cork oaks (Provenda)
entry.content:
295.000€
Farm Canada Aljezur - water, electricity, cork oaks
prev
next
Reserved
62m²  62.750m²REF PV-T-544

Sale
Beautiful property with 62.750sqm, comprising a forest area with pine trees, cork oaks and arbutus trees. In this property there is a house in ruins with 62sqm with the possibility of expansion up to 300sqm. Easy access, about 5 km from Praia da Amoreira and less than 1 km from Aljezur. Public Water and Electricity.

entry.title: House 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique (Provenda)
entry.content:
318.500€
House 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique
prev
next
136m²  308,70m²REF PV-M-545

Sale
Picturesque building renovated in 2020. Renovation included structure and new roof. The building is divided into 3 fractions (Studio, T1 and T2) Very versatile space, which allows immediate profitability of the space. The renovation was carried out respecting the environment and using natural materials You will immediately feel at home, with the colors, textures and good vibe. Charming place where you can live with your family and friends 15 minutes from Aljezur and only 20 minutes from the main beaches

entry.content:
800.000€
Farm 3+1 bedrooms Amorosa Aljezur
prev
next
300m²  110.000m²REF PV-T-542

Sale
Exclusive property, located next to Amoreira Beach. With fabulous views over the Sea and the Aljezur River. Unique opportunity, given this fabulous setting, in the Natural Park of the Costa Vicentina , to enjoy this surroundings, with great areas-land and housing(this can be expanded). Lagos is only 25 minutes away and Faro airport is about 70 minutes.

Excellent property with 15,492 HA, with 2 old buildings with a total area of 357sqm. Located in the Natural Park of Costa Vicentina, close to the coastal zone. Supplied with water through the irrigation canal and electricity from the public network.

entry.title: Farm Pero Vicente Rogil Aljezur - water, electricity (Provenda)
entry.content:
305.000€
Farm Pero Vicente Rogil Aljezur - water, electricity
prev
next
Sold
158,20m²  57.510m²REF PV-T-530

Sale
Magnificent Property, with a privileged location, bordering the Sea and very close to Vale dos Praia Homens. With a semi-detached old house to be recovered, with the possibility of being enlarged the construction area. Good land for agriculture, supplied with irrigation water from the Mira Dam and electricity from the public network. With a sun exposure totally to the South and with Unique and Excellent surrounding Landscapes. Next to Rogil, 10 minutes from Aljezur and 30 minutes from Lagos. Opportunity to live in this Exclusive space, which is the Costa Vicentina.

prev

Sold
200m²  552.750m²REF PV-T-523

Sale
Property situated on the Costa Vicentina, close to Odeceixe and 8.5 km from Aljezur. Easy access, about 1.5 km from EN 120. With a Unique Natural Beauty, having several clusters of trees, pinetrees and corkoak trees, a charming Spring and nooks overlooking the Serra de Monchique. Water and Electricity from public network.
